pageTitle: Itinerary for Friday, September 16, 2016 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Itinerary for the Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, for Friday, September 16, 2016:

Montréal, Quebec

12:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will host a luncheon for African Heads of Delegation.

Hyatt Regency
Ovation Room, Level 5
1255 Jeanne-Mance Street
Montréal, Quebec    

Notes for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity
  • 11:30 am media sweep.

1:30 p.m. The Prime Minister will deliver remarks at the opening of the Global Fund Fifth Replenishment Conference.

Hyatt Regency
Grand Salon Opera ABC, Level 4
1255 Jeanne-Mance Street
Montréal, Quebec    

Note for media:

  • Open coverage

3:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will hold a bilateral meeting with His Excellency, Macky Sall, President of Senegal.

Hyatt Regency
Symphonie 3B Room, Level 5
1255 Jeanne-Mance Street
Montréal, Quebec

Note for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity

3:20 p.m. The Prime Minister will hold a bilateral meeting with His Excellency Modibo Keita, Prime Minister of the Republic of Mali.

Hyatt Regency
Symphonie 3B Room, Level 5
1255 Jeanne-Mance Street
Montréal, Quebec

Note for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity

3:40 p.m. The Prime Minister will hold a bilateral meeting with The Right Honourable Michaëlle Jean, Secretary General of La Francophonie .

Hyatt Regency
Symphonie 3B Room, Level 5
1255 Jeanne-Mance Street
Montréal, Quebec

Note for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity

4:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will hold a bilateral meeting with Her Excellency Sheikh Hasina, Prime Minister of Bangladesh.

Hyatt Regency
Symphonie 3B Room, Level 5
1255 Jeanne-Mance Street
Montréal, Quebec

Note for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity

4:20 p.m. The Prime Minister will hold a bilateral meeting with His Excellency Alassane Ouattara, President of Côte d’Ivoire.

Hyatt Regency
Symphonie 3B Room, Level 5
1255 Jeanne-Mance Street
Montréal, Quebec

Note for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity

4:40 p.m. The Prime Minister will hold a bilateral meeting with His Excellency Faure Essozimna Gnassingbé, President of Togo.

Hyatt Regency
Symphonie 3B Room, Level 5
1255 Jeanne-Mance Street
Montréal, Quebec

Note for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity

5:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will hold a bilateral meeting with His Excellency Mamady Youla, Prime Minister of Guinea.

Hyatt Regency
Symphonie 3B Room, Level 5
1255 Jeanne-Mance Street
Montréal, Quebec

Note for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity
